name: Lalaloopsy Girls - Cloud Sculpting
description:
Help the Lalaloopsy Girls ace their Cloud Sculpting 101 class in this new game!
Pull clouds from the sky and sculpt them into beautiful shapes.
Move quickly or the clouds may disappear.
Use rain clouds and storm clouds for better grades. But be careful, those clouds can be tricky!
Make as many as you can before time runs out!

----------------------------------------------------------------
Features
----------------------------------------------------------------
• 11 Characters
• Tons of magical clouds to create
• Achievements galore
• Hidden Surprises!!

Having problems? Suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at onlinedev@mgae.com.
